content: ‘ the meeting … was delayed because of “scheduling conflicts for several of the principles including several people traveling today to Wisconsin.”’ So, WTF was going in in Wisconsin that was more important the climate of Planet Earth?? “Promoting jobs.” Not creating them, not raising wages, not selling an actual policy or bill that would IN FACT actually create jobs….. no, just a bad photo-op like he’s still campaigning for President. Perhaps he still is- trying to convince himself that he is actually a real President.
